summary: This is a brief email exchange regarding draft press materials related to Jeffrey Epstein, dated July 3, 2019. The content is minimal, showing internal communication about approving the release of these materials.

events.title: Approval of Epstein Press Materials
events.description: An email exchange shows approval being given to proceed with draft press materials related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated July 3, 2019, concerning draft press materials related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The communication is internal, with senders and recipients redacted as (USANYS).
The email shows a brief approval to proceed with the press materials.
The document is part of a series, with references to EFTA00010467, EFTA00010468, and EFTA00010469.
